Reviews.Title: Like a user-friendly version of the J38 with new features!!!
Reviews.Author: 1Dub79
Reviews.Content: This version of the Finepix has many similarities to the Fujifilm Finepix J38 12MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD, which I reviewed in November. There are a few differences. One new feature of this camera is the HD Movie Mode, which shows in 720p and 1920 x 1080 stills. The camera also has compatibility with HDTVs, which means the pictures will show in HD, if they are reviewed on an HDTV. The camera also has a new Smile and Blink Detection system. Once the shooter holds the camera up to a subject, who smiles, the camera will automatically take the photo. The Blink Detection feature is nice because the camera will alert the shooter that subject is blinking. Therefore, the shooter will have the option to take a better photo.I also noticed after reviewing a taken photo, a message will say "face detected." The user now has the option to do a close-up review of the person's face, whom they have taken a picture of. Another difference is this camera is a little more user-friendly. The camera now has a shooting mode dial. This means the person can just turn the dial to the shooting mode, which they want to go to. In addition, the modes tell you what they do. Still, a user will have to go to the menus to do modify the camera, such as change the movie mode and shooting image quality and repeated shooting options. Compared to the Fujifilm Finepix J38 12MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7 inch LCD, I must say that the JV100's photos are a little more vivid. I took pictures with both and saw the difference. I must admit, the HD movie mode is very underrated. In fact, it shows almost as good as many HD camcorders. Collectively, that makes this camera a steal.The biggest flaw with this camera is the HD Movie Mode just sucks the life out of the camera. I would suggest staying using that mode wisely. With that in mind, users are not obligated to use the HD movie mode. It can be changed to the 640 x 480 shooting resolution. Another flaw is this camera cannot be charged, while the battery is in the camera. The battery must be taken out, and placed in the charger. Also, the camera was poorly designed for recording a movie. For example, the female part, which the tripod screws in, is on the bottom right side of the camera. Most cameras have it directly at the bottom of the camera. Not to mention, the built-in microphone is right next to it. Some tri-pods will cover a portion of the built-in microphone. This can lead to altered play-back on the movies. These issues make me give this camera a rating of four.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Many Feautures
Reviews.Author: Christi <3
Reviews.Content: I received this camera as a present for my 15th birthday. I loved it at once because of the sleek appearance and handy mode dial. Another nifty part about it is that there are 10+ ''positions"  and on  the screen it has a discription of each one. They are: Snow, Fireworks, Baby, Portrait, Night Scenery (tripod and no tripod), Sport, Landscape, Panorama, Text, Flower (macro), Party, Beach, Sunset, and Smile& Shoot. Each one actually makes a big difference, and it's nice to have so many options. Most other Point&Shoots; do not have so many.Something I love about the JV100 is that it has SRAuto, which automatically selects the best mode according to the situation. It is actually really accurate and perfect if you're in a hurry.The picture quality is also impressive. Both indoors and outdoors the images come out nicely and with a lot of detail and depth. The colors are beautiful and vivid. The movie mode is pretty good, and a plus is that you can zoom while taping.The only problems I have with this FinePix are that the Smile&Shoot; doesn't always work, but that's not a major deal. My last complaint is the battery life. I have to charge it at least once a day.Pros:-many position options-great price for value-good image quality-you can zoom while recording a video-easy to use and figure out-compact and good looking-huge LCD screenCons:-only comes in blue and black-ok battery lifeP.S. The camera comes with a CD that is great for organizing and editing your uploaded pictures. Cool!Overall, this is a great camera that I'd recommend for anyone that wants a Point and Shoot. FugiFilm has really done a great job.Thanks for reading!_________________________________________Update, July 13My little brother dropped this camera from about 5 ft in the air and it started to have issues with turning on. I was reluctant to return it, but the thing would rarely turn on so I had no choice. I pruchased the FinePix Z70 as a replacement, and heres my experiance: This one is better than the newer, more expensive model. I would like to get the JV100 again, but my mom won't let me because she doesn't want to deal with Best Buy's costumer service again :(

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera, super price!
Reviews.Author: Gary
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my wife to replace an Olympus that had been lost. I was looking for a simple to use little digital camera that would take excellent pictures and that is what she got with this camera. Super easy to use right out of the box and it takes excellent pictures. It is nice and light weight but works like a heavy weight. Simple for her to hook up directly to her computer to download and save the pictures. Great camera for a fantastic price.

Reviews.Title: Another cheap camera
Reviews.Author: OP_4
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera 3 months ago from a major retailer and it is now broken with out any known cause. There has been no abuse, water submersion, or any other events to cause a malfunction not even humidity, I live in a temperate desert. All of a sudden an error message of "TURN CAMERA OFF AND TURN IT ON AGAIN" appeared stopping the camera from functioning. I contacted Fujifilm's technical support to trouble shoot the problem. Their answer was to reset the camera to its default settling. When this didn't work they referred me to the return and repair department where they informed me that I would have to pay to ship the camera to one of there repair facility and it would take 15 business days after receiving the device before they would begin to diagnose the camera and email me quote for the repairs. I think this is unacceptable I'll cut my losses now before I have to repeat this process again in another 3 months. Save yourself time and money, don't buy this POS.

Reviews.Title: Less than what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: J. Minton
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because it had a rechargable battery, HD video, and a clicker wheel (technical term). I took some pictures with it. The details were totally washed out, it was unresponsive in its auto-smile feature, and the video quality was garbage. Look up some of the videos on youtube. There is a high-pitched shrieking noise in 720p and a different flavor of static in each of the other two settings. Promptly returned and now looking for something better.

Reviews.Title: The Absolute Worst Camera I've Ever Owned
Reviews.Author: Deelock
Reviews.Content: This is my first review ever on this site and I'm doing it just to complain about how awful this camera is.DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA!I have two major complaints: One being that the battery lasts an extremely short amount of time. There have been several occasions where I've charged this camera the a day or two before I've needed it only to find that the battery was dead by the time I've gone to use it.My second complaint is the difficulty I have had trying to import photos to my computer (Mac). The files are corrupt and I've lost a lot of pictures I needed. I'm also having trouble viewing the files on the camera itself, it keeps giving me a "read error."This camera broke after only a couple of uses and even if it was only $20 it would be a rip-off.

Reviews.Title: Good, Quality Camera for the Price
Reviews.Author: Carson True "Carson"
Reviews.Content: I've had several PAC cameras in the past and after my last one broke, I needed to definitely purchase a new one. I was looking for something with good, sharp pictures, but something that didn't beat me over the head with features designed to hold the photographer's hand. This is about right.First, let me say what it doesn't have. I'd like some more control over basic functions, ISO, etc, but it does a good job of figuring out the best attributes for the shot -- I've yet to have a traditional "bad" shot on automatic. Panorama and macro modes are very solid, although the former I wouldn't recommend for anything beyond a basic landscape without a tripod.The only other issues I would have deal with the gearing of the lens, which sounds a little noisey. I don't have any issues with it, but I feel like a few years down the line there might be some issues with it sticking -- but by then I'll probably have a new camera, so it's not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: Great purchase for the price.
Reviews.Author: T. Bostrom
Reviews.Content: I left my Canon T2i at home because I was coming to Iraq and didnt' want to ruin it - so I ordered the Fuji and this camera is well worth the price that was paid - it takes awesome pics and has given me the chance to capture memories that will last for years to come.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good
Reviews.Author: LUv2Read443
Reviews.Content: I think the camera overall is a pretty good deal. The picture are clear and amazing and Luzy's Storage Placedelivered my item to me in ONE business with standard deliverly. I thought that was amazing.The only thing you have to be careful with is its size. This this is really small, but if your someone who carries one around often I guess this may work in your favor.

Reviews.Title: Ratings
Reviews.Author: Carlosluis
Reviews.Content: camera to buy this gift and it turns out that when taking pictures do not come out focused, try to take them again and again but all I otraq are blurry and want to enlarge the photos look pixelated. I do not recommend this camera does not take good photos.

Reviews.Title: Good little camera.
Reviews.Author: R. Bell "Rick"
Reviews.Content: I have two of these and overall I am quite satisfied with them.For the price I paid for these little cameras, they are not bad units.  The picture quality is pretty good.  Not as good as I would have expected from a 12MP camera, but quite acceptable.  In low light situations, the picture tends to become grainy looking.I have been able to capture some stunning sunset and cloud pictures with the camera mounted to a tripod.  Could use a little more bit-depth, but then this is not a 100-500+dollar camera.The videos are actually pretty good, seeing as this camera isn't necessarily designed as a video camera per-se.  The only thing I have found is that the audio can be a bit quirky sometimes.  It will be silent until a sound breaks a certain threshold.  Once that threshold is opened up, it will record audio.  It's kind of like a gate or something along that line.  Those into audio recording will understand the "gate" reference.  BTW, this audio anomaly is present on both of these cameras.Overall, I can recommend this camera for good general and everyday use.

Reviews.Title: Picture perfect
Reviews.Author: charlie
Reviews.Content: i have bought 2 of this cameras before and i like it alot and it was really cheap on the price cant beat that i liked it a lot

Reviews.Title: Bad flash delay and too slow to download pictures
Reviews.Author: Jen D
Reviews.Content: I really dislike this camera, in fact it is the worst camera I have ever owned. These are the biggest reasons:1. When you take a flash picture there is such a long delay its almost like the ones that run off AA batteries.2. To set the mode (video, panorama, auto, etc.) you have to revolve this little dial around to the correct setting. However the dial doesn't work and even when its on video most of the time it just takes a picture. So you have to fiddle with this little dial trying to get it to think its on video, but by the time it "gets it" your video shot is over!3. It has seized up on me while filming several times. As in the video just freezes and you have to manually remove the battery to reset the camera, and your video file is lost as complete junk and unplayable.4. When transferring your pics to your computer it is soooooooooooo slow, in fact if there are more than about 100 pics on the memory card it refuses to budge at all, so I have to put the memory card in my other camera to transfer them. This happens even if the battery has just been charged completely.Anyway, do not buy this! The Nikon Coolpix I bought to replace it solved all of these problems.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price.
Reviews.Author: Charmerci
Reviews.Content: I guess excepting some of the quality control problems that some OTHER people have had giving this camera 1 star, I think it's a great camera for the price - especially since Amazon just dropped the price. (Though I haven't done any HD movie shots yet.) I've had zero problems with mine.Admittedly, I haven't tried out too many of the features on the camera. I just set the camera setting to N (natural ambiance) or N with the flash if needed and take photos. Works great and easily. I love its light weight. I've recently blown up some photos that I've changed quite a bit on the computer to 8x10 prints. I am very surprised by the high quality. (I used to take photos with old Nikon lenses in the 35mm format.) So much so, I'm not afraid of doing exhibitions with them.I guess I'm not too worried if the thing is perfect - if the photos' exposure isn't perfect, I don't really care because I just fine tune the good ones on the computer anyway. The great photographer Ansel Adams once said that 90% of the work that a photographer does is in the darkroom.The one tiny thing that bothers me the most is the miniature On/Off button. I have smallish sensitive fingers but turning the thing on is not easy. If you have big, fat fingers, forget it.

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: Garry Johnson
Reviews.Content: Very sleek and easy to use. Superb pictures and you don't have to be a good photographer to get a great shot.

Reviews.Title: The Worst Camera That I Have Ever Owned
Reviews.Author: ne_plus_ultra_1
Reviews.Content: If you are shooting high-light outside conditions with nothing in motion you will do fine with this camera.My old S3-IS would have done an infinitely superior job at my son's school event which the recording of is now wasted because of this piece of junk Fuji camera.The S3 has half the megapixels but takes pictures twice as good.The camera also came with a defective battery which Fuji declined to replace.  It would self-discharge in 3 days flat.  The cheapie replacement batteries have no such problem.The only utility I have for this camera is letting my kids use it because I am not concerned about it getting damaged.This is a far cry from the old days of Fuji paper being the best.Fuji has absolutely lost my business forever.  Horrible customer support, crap product.

Reviews.Title: Fuji's Fine Pix Does Not Have It All
Reviews.Author: John F. Conte, Sr.
Reviews.Content: There are so many things about the camera that i love.  However, unless i am not operating it correctly, i find that photos are not always in focus.

Reviews.Title: So so
Reviews.Author: Minou V. "Minou"
Reviews.Content: This camera is not that great. The pictures come out blurry and dark. I guess I got what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Gran Papa "two guns and one bullet"
Reviews.Content: But this has been one of my best camera although it's a little old lady and I have it still is the everyday use. I love my camera.

Reviews.Title: Bought for 8 y.o. daughter
Reviews.Author: crispinmilk
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera for just about anyone who is looking for a high quality point-n-shoot.  My wife had one, and I was so happy with the ease of use and quality of pictures she took, I refused to get anything else but another just like it.The price is just right for what you get.  My wife keeps hers in a soft skin cover in her purse.  It gets a workout.  Still works and looks like new.  Battery lasts FOREVER.  Works well with PC's (Win XP, Vista, 7)

Reviews.Title: On Off button will not work
Reviews.Author: Margie Florida "Margie"
Reviews.Content: I like the camera it takes great pics and videos but I've had it a little over a year and the On/Button is broken. I can't turn it on, if it does come on it will  not shut off.

Reviews.Title: Trash
Reviews.Author: Nicholas Keizer
Reviews.Content: The flash does not work properly. Also, the battery stop charging after charging it once. What a waste of money

Reviews.Title: Another Person with a Broken Camera
Reviews.Author: ugagirl
Reviews.Content: The lithium battery stopped working properly a few months after I bought this camera. I even wasted another $30 on a new battery, which did not solve the problem. Save your money.

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm FinePix Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert A. Crigger
Reviews.Content: I have owned these camera's in the past. I like how slim they have gotten and it takes wonderful pictures.

Reviews.Title: Horrible Camera
Reviews.Author: Lui
Reviews.Content: It takes really bad pictures... takes forever to shoot...overall horrible. returned within 2 days ...I say look for another brand. Fujifilm was a disappointment

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Cory Christman
Reviews.Content: Puchased this camera June 19, 2010 a day before I was leaving for a business trip to Germany so I could have a compact light weight camera.  This is our secondary camera and has been used 3 times.  The last time I tried to use it 3 months after purchase, the camera lens would not close. Now the camera is worthless.  Spent almost $150 after taxes for a camera that was used 3 times.  I would not recommend this camera.  Had an Oplympus camera for years without issue.

Reviews.Title: Problems.
Reviews.Author: Anna E. Stubbs "SEA1180"
Reviews.Content: My husband bought this camera before deploying. We liked it so much we found it on Amazon to buy one to replace my old camera. I received it quickly. However when turning it on and off and when taking a photo the lens part sounded like it was grinding. I tried taking photos with it and the photos turned out great, but the noise would not go away. I know it is just this particular camera since the other one we bought did great. I have to return it, but I do intend to purchase another one.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: mamy
Reviews.Content: i bought this camera about a month ago and i love it. i haven't had any problems with it yet.the price is really good. i just love it

Reviews.Title: Excelente
Reviews.Author: migue obispo
Reviews.Content: buenos dias gracias por la Fujifilm FinePix JV100 12 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7inch LCD (Black)esta camara esta es muy buena gracias excelente camara se la recomiendo a todo gracias por todo en verdad son muy buenos vendedores los recomiendo a todo soy muy buenoas gracias soy de venezuela saludos.

Reviews.Title: Extremely Poor Quality
Reviews.Author: SLourdes
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera in January, 2011, and by March, 2011 it was broken. The LCD screen cracked, and when I sent it back in for the 1 year warranty, I was told that there was "impact damage" not covered by the warranty. However, the camera was inside of a padded case, and sustained no impact damage. I simply turned the camera on, and it was broken.I am very dissatisfied with this product, as well as Fuji's customer service. I had another Finepix from 2005-2011 that I loved, that was very sturdy, and took great photos. This one is obviously overly fragile and poorly made. It seems as thought the quality has decreased over the years. I will not be buying another Fuji.

Reviews.Title: battery charger
Reviews.Author: ftb
Reviews.Content: Delivered in record time (as always) by Amazon... Took the camera out of packaging and immediately set up the Lithium battery in the charger. Plugged the unit into AC outlet and went and enjoyed Christmas Eve... Next morning I pulled the battery, placed inside the camera unit and it did not work...  Turns out the charger itself is the culprit.... Set up a return and report back some "real" findings once I receive a working unit.. Fuji has always pleased me in the quality of their digital line up... Hoping this just to be a bum charger.

Reviews.Title: Dick's Pix
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Barrett
Reviews.Content: It is a light camera, fits easily in your pocket and has operation options explained as you go along.  Pictures good quality.  Not much image stabilization.

Reviews.Title: is it really a fuji
Reviews.Author: George E. Washington
Reviews.Content: i have owned several fuji cameras and they were superior to other brands to me. however, this one is in my opinion a cheap piece of junk.

ProductInfo.Features:
12-megapixel resolution for large, photo-quality prints
Capture 720p HD movies with sound
Tracking Auto Focus
Smile and Blink Detection; Face Detection and Automatic Red-eye Removal
Scene Recognition Auto (SR AUTO)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix JV100 12 MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom and 2.7inch LCD (Black)
